summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior, correctness, and edge‑case handling of JAX arrays, including device placement, sharding strategies, copying, deletion, dtype/shape handling, and integration with JIT and parallel primitives.
business_intent: Provide confidence that JAX array operations work reliably across single‑ and multi‑device setups, supporting developers building high‑performance numerical and machine‑learning applications with JAX.
